prompt: Image Prompt: Create an ethereal and captivating scene depicting a divine figure, symbolizing God, in a moment of contemplation and decision-making. Show rays of light shining down upon this figure, surrounded by swirling clouds, conveying the concept of a powerful being capable of changing its mind. Include subtle visual cues like an open book or a scroll to symbolize the scriptures or divine wisdom. Capture a sense of mystery and reverence in the image, illustrating the profound nature of God's ability to reconsider and alter plans in alignment with His divine will.
